attacks.name: Dark Flame
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Houndoom or this attack does nothing. If there are any Energy cards in your discard pile, attach 1 of them to Houndoom.

attacks.name: Black Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Houndoom. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.
